name: Client and Matter Risk Assessment - Individual Clients
description: Client and Matter Risk Assessment - Individual Clients

fields.hint: Please consult the Eventus AML Compliance Assistant for guidance on FATF-equivalent and HRTC jurisdictions - https://chatgpt.com/g/g-6900c3bae3888191865925d101ad8400-eventus-aml-compliance-assistant

content.text: At this stage, record facts only. Do not assume identity has been verified. The Compliance Assistant will determine the level of verification required.

label.value: So far as you are aware, is the individual a Politically Exposed Person (PEP), or a family member or known close associate of a PEP?

fields.hint: If "Yes", Enhanced Due Diligence will be required

label.value: Is the work to be carried out routine for Eventus?

fields.label: Expected value of transaction
fields.hint: If the matter doesn't involve a transaction, please enter £0

label.value: Is this expected to be a one-off instruction or part of an ongoing relationship?

fields.label: In which countries does the individual: (i) earn income (ii) hold assets and/or (iii) conduct business or investment activity

label.value: Does the matter involve any activities, income, assets, or transactions connected with: (i) a FATF-listed High-Risk Third Country; or (ii) any jurisdiction subject to UK sanctions?

fields.hint: Please consult the Eventus AML Compliance Assistant for guidance

fields.label: Section 5 - Source of Funds / Source of Wealth Indicators

label.value: Does this matter involve movement or receipt of funds?
Will funds be received into Eventus' client account?
What is the source of funds?
options: Business profits (from client's own UK business)
Sale of personal assets in the UK (e.g. property, shares)
Sale of personal assets outside the UK

label.value: Will funds originate or terminate outside the UK?

fields.label: Please confirm anticipated timing / volume of receipts

label.value: Are you aware of any factors that make the transaction unusual, complex, or economically irrational?
Has the individual been reluctant or slow to provide information or documentation?
